text: saheadaranmar parannu: "avan kattuvenkil avanre saheadaranum mump kattittunt.” yusuph iteakke tanre manas'silealippiccuveccu. yatharthyam avareat velippetuttiyilla. addeham itramatram parannu: "ninnalute nilapat nanne measantanne. ninnal parannuntakkunnatinepparriyeakke nannayariyavunnavanan allahu.”
